description:
Related to the previous React Native task. We would like to have a react native ios/android client search. The app starts with a search screen:
1.  the user search the client in a textbox 
2.  the result has been paginated.
3.  when the user click in one item, we get the client details.
4. In the search result we provide buttons for (create/update/delete/) the selected client (even if we dont implement them).
name: React Native App Client search
